13381.「ああ <pc>さん。おひさしぶりです。\n そろそろ いらっしゃる頃かと思い\:
Oh, <pc>. Long time no see.
I thought you'd be there about now, so
I figured I would try and contact you.

13382.「この間なんて 全然ちがう人に\n 話しかけてしまって ずいぶん 相手を\n お:
Just the other day, I ended up talking to a
completely different person by mistake,
which really gave them a scare.

13383.「あなたと こうして話すのも\n もう けっこうな回数になるのに\n あんな失敗:
I've talked to you quite a few times now, and
to make such a mistake like that...it's quite
embarrassing.

13386.「もし……もし よかったらで\n いいんですけれど……\n 一度 私と 会ってみ:
Would...would you perhaps, be...
Be interested in meeting with me?
If it's okay with you, that is...

13387.「おたがい 相手の顔が わからないので\n 目印となる服装と 待ち合わせ場所を\:
Since neither of us know the other's appearance, I think it would be wise to wear something that stands out and pick
a place to meet.

13388.「……そうですね。<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を装備して\n プクランド大陸:
Yes, okay... Why don't we go to Pukuland and
meet in Fostail Square in Muruel Forest? We'll
both wear a Saffron Hat, too.

13389.「おお よかった！\n 断られるんじゃないかと思って\n ドキドキしちゃいました:
Oh, thank goodness! I was so nervous that you
would say no.

13390.「じつは 以前から <pc>さんとは\n 直接 会ってみたいと思ってたんです。\:
To be honest, I've wanted to meet you in
person for some time now. I suppose you
feel the same way, too.

13391.「おたがいに <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を装備して\n ミュルエルの森のフ:
We'll meet in Fostail Square in Muruel Forest
wearing a Saffron Hat. Be sure not to forget!

13392.「それでは 今日のところは 失礼します。\n お会いできるの 楽しみにしてますか:
Please excuse me for today, then. I look
forward to our meeting!

13393.「よかった！……と言いたいところですが\n あなたは 今 たくさんの頼まれごとを:
Thank goodness! ...However, it seems you're a
tad busy with other requests right now.

13394.「しかたありません。\n この件は また今度……ということで。:
Oh, well. We can talk about this another
time.

13395.「……そうですか。残念ですね。\n もし 気が変わったら また\n この鏡に 話:
...I see. That's unfortunate. If you do change
your mind, please come and speak to the
mirror again.

13397.「……あ！ もしかして 直接 会いたいって\n 私の願いを かなえてくださるとか:
Ah...! Perhaps you've come to accept my
request of meeting you in person?

13398.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>をつけたヤツ……\n 貴様が リュナンだな？:
Somebody wearin' a Saffron Hat...
So you're Lunan?

13399.「……あで？ おかしいど アニキ。\n 聞いた話だど リュナンって奴は もっと…:
...Huh? What are you, nuts? I heard that
Lunan's a bit more...

13400.「うっせー うっせー！\n メギドローム様は <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を:
Hey, shut it! Master Megidrome told us to
bring him somebody wearin' a Saffron Hat,
didn't he?

13401.「だったら オレら 舎弟は\n 言われたとおりにするだけだろーが！:
As his underlings, we just gotta do what
we're told!

13403.「おい 貴様っ！ メギドローム様の命令だど。\n 一緒に 来てもらうかんな！:
Hey, you there! Our Master sent us. You're
comin' with us!

13404.「抵抗しても いいんだぜぇ！\n ただし ようしゃなく たたきのめすケドな！\n:
Resist all ya like! But we'll just beat on ya
until ya give up! Gee hee hee...

13405.「……あのぅ もしかして あなたが\n <cs_pchero>さんですか？<ye:
Um, by any chance, are you
<if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <cs_pchero>?<yesno><close>

13406.「ああ よかった！\n ウルトラ速達便で ここに届けるよう\n 言われて はるば:
Oh, thank heavens! I was told to deliver this
via our ultra express delivery, so I came all
this way to find you.

13407.「こんな魔物の出る 危険な場所で\n もし 届ける相手が 見つからなかったら\n:
What a relief...I was so worried I wouldn't
be able to find you. This place is super
dangerous and filled with monsters!

13408.「うわー どうしよう！\n ウルトラ速達便で ここに届けるよう\n 言われて 来:
Ahh, what should I do?! I was told to deliver
this here via our ultra express delivery!

13409.「もう 特別料金 もらっちゃってるから\n 放りだすわけにも いかないし……。:
And I can't just throw it out, since I've
already been paid the special fee for doing
so...

13410.「いいや！ もう あなたに 託しちゃいます。\n <cs_pchero>って人が:
No way! I'm just going to leave this with you.
If someone by the name of <cs_pchero>
comes here, please give this to them!

13415.親愛なる <cs_pchero>さんへ\nまず 最初に 謝らせてください。\n今:
"Dear <cs_pchero>,
First of all, please allow me to apologize.
I am sorry I could not make it today."

13416.ギリギリになって どうしても行けない理由が\nできてしまい 中止を伝えようにも方:
"I had some last minute reasons for not being
able to make it, and there was no way for me
to let you know in time that I had to cancel."

13417.くわしい事情は シーバの鏡を通して\n説明したいので 申し訳ないのですが\n戻っ:
"Please allow me to explain what happened
via the mirror. I hate to ask, but would you
please return to the room in the inn?"

13418.どうか この手紙が\n無事 あなたの元に 届きますように。\n:
"I pray that this letter reaches you safely.
                           Your friend, Lunan"

13420.「待ち合わせに 行けなかったばかりか\n 魔物が 私とあなたを まちがえて\n:
Not only did I miss our meeting, but those
monsters mistook you for me, and attacked
you...

13421.「もう お気づきのこととは思いますが\n じつは 私 メギドロームという魔物に\:
I assume that you are now aware that a monster
called Megidrome is pursuing me.

13422.「今回 行けなかったのも 私が\n フォステイル広場に 行くという予定が\n ヤ:
The reason I was unable to meet was that he
somehow found out that I was planning
to go to Fostail Square.

13423.「……でも こっちの勝手な都合ですよね。\n せめてもの おわびの気持ちです。\:
...But that's just my own selfish concern.
Please accept this as a small token of
my apology.

13424.「……今回のことで こりましたよ。\n 魔物にねらわれている身の上で\n 人と会:
I've definitely learned my lesson. It was a
mistake to try and meet with someone
while I'm being targeted by monsters.

13425.「……いえ。この鏡での会話も しばらくは\n ひかえた方が いいかもしれませんね:
...No. I think it might be best to hold off on
these mirror conversations for a while.

13426.「とても なごり惜しいですが……: I'm quite sad to say so...

13552.「おう おう また来てくれるとは\n うれしーじゃねえか！:
Oh, lookie there! I'm so glad you came
back!

13553.「連れてこいって 命令なのに\n ブッ倒しちまって どうすんだって\n 困ってた:
I think we mighta gone a bit overboard and
beat you up too bad, so we were kinda at
a loss...

13554.「バッ……テメエ。\n 余計なこと言うんじゃねーよ！:
Ggh...you idiot! Don't say such stupid
things!

13555.「とにかく 今度こそは\n 一緒に 来てもらうぜぇ！\n 覚悟しなっ！！:
Anyways! This time you're comin' with us!
Brace yourself!!

41542.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a room containing
a mirror.

41544.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a room containing
a mirror.

41546.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a room containing
a mirror.

41547.「……そうですか そんなことが。\n 重ね重ね すみませんでした。:
I see, so that's what happened...
I am so, so sorry.
